statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01T00:00:00Z';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE username ILIKE 'johndoe' OR username ILIKE 'janedoe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission_level = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, ac.permission_level FROM users u JOIN access_control ac ON u.user_id = ac.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, a.permission_level FROM users u JOIN access_control a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.username, a.permission_level FROM users u JOIN access_control a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.permission_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE id = 2;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.id;
SELECT id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.id;
SELECT id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.id WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, role_name FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.id = user_roles.role_id ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE created_at < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE expiry_at < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name, user_sessions.token FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id;
SELECT users.username, blocked_users.blocked_at FROM users LEFT JOIN blocked_users ON users.user_id = blocked_users.blocked_user_id;
SELECT users.username, user_sessions.token FROM users INNER JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com%';

SELECT user_id, email, password_hash FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;

SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN banned_users ON users.user_id = banned_users.user_id WHERE reason = 'spam';
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = '3c89ab12-6197-4fb4-b058-ef4db94a8624' ORDER BY username DESC;
